pkgmetadata.longdescription: Open-source, GPL-licensed, multiplatform, multithreaded video transcoder.

use.flag: Support for the streaming media framework from media-libs/gstreamer.
Support for encoding AAC using media-libs/fdk-aac.
Support for encoding AAC using media-video/libav's internal encoder.
Adds support for NVIDIA Encoder (NVENC) API for hardware accelerated encoding on NVIDIA cards.
Support for encoding h265 using media-libs/x265.
